data.title: Record of the Day
data.meta_description: Described by Popjustice as 'basically S Club with better haircuts', Jive's Six D release the infectious Best Damn Night as their first single. The track has been Song of the Day at Popjustice, while the video - now VIP track of the week on 4Music, Kiss, Smash Hits & The Box - had a Sun online exclusive and Vevo homepage splash this week. TV promo secured includes a T4 performance and Channel 4's Koko Pop. Pitched as 'the world’s first street dancing pop band', the youngsters worked with celebrity choreographer and creative director Laurieann Gibson (known for her work with Lady Gaga) on the music video. As appetite for Streetdance/ Step Up movies and acts like Diversity continues, Six D's arrival comes at just the right time and in fine style too. Video.
data.text:
Best Damn Night

Artist: Six D

Label: Jive

Impact date: July 24

ROTD featured date: Wednesday 1 June 2011

We say

Described by Popjustice as 'basically S Club with better haircuts', Jive's Six D release the infectious Best Damn Night as their first single. The track has been Song of the Day at Popjustice, while the video - now VIP track of the week on 4Music, Kiss, Smash Hits & The Box - had a Sun online exclusive and Vevo homepage splash this week. TV promo secured includes a T4 performance and Channel 4's Koko Pop. Pitched as 'the world’s first street dancing pop band', the youngsters worked with celebrity choreographer and creative director Laurieann Gibson (known for her work with Lady Gaga) on the music video. As appetite for Streetdance/ Step Up movies and acts like Diversity continues, Six D's arrival comes at just the right time and in fine style too. Video.

Contact

Kelly Bush, Jive - +44 (0)20 7361 8271

Management: Darren Michaelson, Twenty First Artists

Submit your music

We are always looking for future hits and stars - signed and unsigned. To submit music for consideration please send an email with a link to one track and some info to Kevin Marston.

Unfortunately we can't respond personally to all submissions, but we do listen to everything.

Two week FREE trial
